p: N. damascena essential oil and β-elemen were tested in the concentration range 1000–32 µg/mL. Serial twofold dilutions were prepared in dimethyl sulphoxide (DMSO; Sigma-Aldrich, St. Louis, , MO, USA) and diluted with medium suitable for the given organism. The final DMSO concentration in the well did not exceed 1% ( v/v) and had no influence on growth of the tested strains.
